extractFactDictList.question: How many scientists developed the cell theory?
extractFactDictList.sentence: The cell theory, which states that all organisms are composed of cells and that cells are the basic units of life, was developed by three scientists:

extractFactDictList.question: Who observed that all plants were made of cells?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Matthias Schleiden - He observed that all plants were made of cells.

extractFactDictList.question: Who observed that all animals were also made of cells?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Theodor Schwann - He observed that all animals were also made of cells.

extractFactDictList.question: Who observed that cells only come from other cells?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Rudolf Virchow - He observed that cells only come from other cells.
